article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. If you need help, please contact our office at 928-783-3333. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

og.description: Cibola High School’s valedictorian will be attending the University of Arizona in the fall on a full-ride scholarship, thanks to being named both a Flinn Scholar and a National Merit Finalist.
og.title: Cibola valedictorian gets full-ride scholarship

article_metadata.description: Cibola High School’s valedictorian will be attending the University of Arizona in the fall on a full-ride scholarship, thanks to being named both a Flinn Scholar and a National Merit Finalist.
